credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George B. Hedges, Class of 1897
dimensions:
Overall: 36 x 29 in. (91.4 x 73.7 cm)
frame: 45 x 39 in. (114.3 x 99.1 cm)
title: Portrait of Zephaniah Swift Moore (1770-1823), Second President of Williams College 1815-1821
inscriptions: c. etched in scratch plate:  Rev. Zephaniah Swift Moore, D.D./ Second President of Williams college 1815 - 1821/ Born November 20, 1770 - Died June 30, 1823/ Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George R. Hedges.
